attributes.action: HOPE FOR HORSES PETITION TO UK GOVERNMENT TO ENFORCE UK LAW - PROTECT HORSES NOW!
attributes.additional_details: Uk horses are protected by Animal Welfare law - but this is infrequently enforced, leading to suffering and death for thousands of horses. THIS MUST STOP! we demand that Government prevent suffering by properly overseeing local enforcement of the law, ensuring that neglect is investigated and offenders prosecuted.
